content: inspired by the movie amadeus these are ***wolfie s mitts *** that unforgettable iconic infectious laugh wolfie was ever joyful elegant flamboyant over-the-top and glamorous as all get out these mitts are reminiscent of beautiful velvet and brocade coats with ruffled edges of sleeves peeking out from beneath wolfie s mitts are sized for tiny smallish and larger hands using heavier yarn and larger needles for each of the three sizes a lighter weight yarn is recommended for the ruffle instructions are also included for a shorter gauntlet the lace pattern is rhythmic intuitive easy to memorize and is both written and charted the pattern is written for magic loop but can easily be adapted for dpns wolfie s mitts have been test knit in lieu of paying a fee for this pattern please consider making a donation to **world central kitchen** since 2010 world central kitchen has been providing meals to communities affected by conflict natural disasters and climate crisis all over the world **https //wck org**
